connector.description: Get weather forecasts from the wttr.in weather forecast service

camel.kamelet.wttrin-source.period.name: camel.kamelet.wttrin-source.period
camel.kamelet.wttrin-source.period.description: The interval between fetches to the wttr.in service in milliseconds

camel.kamelet.wttrin-source.wttrLocation.name: camel.kamelet.wttrin-source.wttrLocation
camel.kamelet.wttrin-source.wttrLocation.description: The location to get weather forecasts Example: "paris", "~Eiffel+tower", "Москва", "muc", "@stackoverflow.com", "94107", "-78.46,106.79"

camel.kamelet.wttrin-source.wttrLanguage.name: camel.kamelet.wttrin-source.wttrLanguage
camel.kamelet.wttrin-source.wttrLanguage.description: The language to use for displaying weather forecasts Example: am ar af be bn ca da de el et fr fa hi hu ia id it lt mg nb nl oc pl pt-br ro ru ta tr th uk vi zh-cn zh-tw

camel.kamelet.wttrin-source.output.name: camel.kamelet.wttrin-source.output
camel.kamelet.wttrin-source.output.description: The type of output Example: current, weather, full
